name: Password Generator
description: This app producted a password as secure as you want to make it with lots of options.
datatip: This app producted a password as secure as you want to make it with lots of options.

name: Coding Quiz
datatip:
As a web developer, you will probably be
asked to complete a coding assessment.
These assessments are typically a combination
of multiple-choice questions and interactive
challenges. In app challenges the user Javascript
with multiple-choice questions. The test
is timed and graded at the end. Also, keep
high scores to measure improvement.
This app utilizes html, css, javascript,
and local storage.

name: Day Planner
description: With the Day Planner app, schedule daily appointments!

name: Weather Dashboard
description: The Weather Dashboard will give the daily forcasts.
datatip:
As an active person, the need to know the weather is a big
deal. Use this weather dashboard to search cities for current
weather conditions and the future weather outlook for
multiple cities. This app utilizes HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: Music Plus
description: Search, play, and create playlists of favorites songs!
datatip:
As a music lover, you want the most
simple way to build and
save your favorite playlists. MusicPlus
is a place where you can do just that.
Create Playlist! Search, play, and
sing along to posted lyrics of
your favorite musical artists.
This app uses a HTML, CSS,
JavaScript, and server-side API.

name: Profile Generator
description: Create a brief github profile for any user!

name: Employee Summary
project: Generate Summary of EMployees Data to HTML File
description: Generate a summary of all staff details.

name: Note Taker
description: Use this app to keep track of daily notes.
datatip:
With busy daily schedules, it's easy to forget things that
need to be done. Many apps make note taking complicated.
With the Note Taker app, busy individuals can keep all
of their notes in an easy to access database. Create,
edit, and save notes with the click of a button. This app
utilizes an express backend to save and retrieve
note data from a JSON file.

name: JobBook
description: The JobBook is a place where software developers can easily find and apply for exciting new jobs posted on GitHub.  JobBook Utilizes MySQL, JavaScript, Handlebars, Materialize, MVC modeling, and server side API calls.
datatip:
The JobBook is a place where software developers
can easily find and apply for exciting new jobs
posted on GitHub. JobBook Utilizes MySQL, JavaScript,
Handlebars, Materialize, MVC modeling, and
server side API calls.

name: Employee Manager
project: Keep track of Employee's Employment Status
description: This app allows empoyees to keep track of their employees employment status.

name: Burger Muncher
project: Devour A Virtual Burger Guilt Free
description: Create a delicious virtual burger to devour!
datatip:
As a burger lover, you probably have lots of burger ideas
the you would like to munch on. Burger Muncher is a low
calorie option that allows the user to add any burger to a list
of burgers to be devoured. The user can click on the button
next to the burger to be devoured to eat it. Once devoured
the burger will appear in the Devoured Burger column.
This application utilizes MySQL, Node, Express,
and Handlebars.

name: Fitness Tracker
datatip:
As an exercise enthusiast, keeping track of daily workouts in
important. With the Workout Tracker, users can create and easily
track their daily workouts. Workout statistics are displayed in
graphical format to easily track gains or loses. Workout Tracker
utilizes Node, NoSQL/MongoDB, HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

name: GAMR
description: Gamers can use GAMR to look up details on any game.  Track lastest game releases and news.
datatip:
Get all of your game data from GAMR. Find popular games, gaming news,
recent releases, upcoming releases, as well as most anticipated games
